addons.name: Firefox Hello Beta
addons.description: The latest beta test version of Firefox Hello
addons.fullDescription:
Firefox Hello is looking at addressing user needs via web sharing in Firefox.

This add-on is the latest version of the current in-development work that is released before the Firefox Hello is updated in Firefox.

Install it only if you want to help test the newest changes - if you want the stable version, you don't need to do anything - its already in Firefox.

addons.name: Disable Add-on Compatibility Checks
addons.description: Reinstates the extensions.checkCompatibility preference without respect to the current application version.
addons.fullDescription: While it used to be possible to disable add-on compatibility checking entirely, by setting the extensions.checkCompatibility preference to false, it is now necessary to set a different preference for each new application version. This add-on re-enables the functionality of extensions.checkCompatibility irrespective of the current application version and disables checking by default. Checking can be re-enabled by disabling the add-on (which can be done without a restart) or by toggling the preference.
